resources.string: You can only have one active account
The following track will start shortly.
Put a pause on adverts: watch this video and unlock %s minutes of non-stop music
Please reopen your app to keep listening
You’ve unlocked your advert-free listening session.
Every time you see or hear an advert, artists get paid. Occasional adverts allow us to continue to support artists and keep SoundCloud free for listeners.

"Every time you see or hear an advert, artists get paid. They’re how we keep SoundCloud free for listeners.
Want to lose the interruptions? Go advert‑free and continue to support your favourite artists with a subscription."
This information will be saved on your profile.
Content on this profile might be inappropriate for those under a certain age.
Loading error. Tap to try again
By signing up I accept the Terms of Use. I have read and understood the Privacy Policy and Cookies Policy.
Smile! This image will appear on your profile.
Almost done. Now choose a display name and add a photo to personalise your profile.
Sorry, but you don’t meet SoundCloud’s minimum age requirements.
Our robots think this sign-up looks too much like spam. If you think this is a mistake, contact SoundCloud support.
We couldn’t create an account for you
We’re having some trouble signing you in.
The domain you have entered seems to not be capable of receiving emails. Did you spell it correctly?
That email address is already associated with an account. Enter a different email address or try signing in.
Oops! An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
Please enter a valid email address.
There’s a problem with your data connection. Check your network settings.
Your password must be at least 6 characters long.
Google+ sign in cannot be used without Google Play Services. Please try another sign in method.
Sorry, we couldn’t sign you in. Please check that you have already created an account and have entered the correct account details.
We couldn’t sign you in. Please try again.
We can’t recover your password right now. Try again soon.
Enter your email address and we’ll send you a link to change your password. If you still need help, visit our Help Centre.
Check your email for instructions about how to change your password.
Something doesn’t sound right. Try signing up at SoundCloud.com.
To create an account, we need your permission for Facebook to share your email with us.
Image displayed while the cast receiver is playing an ad
Current position is at the head of the live stream
Tap to cast music to your TV and Cast enabled speakers
This will use more storage space on your device.
This will free up storage space on your device.

Re-download existing content in standard quality?
Playlists and albums you have liked or created will show up here.
Not all your playlists and albums are being shown. Clear filters to see them all.
Welcome to your Library. A single destination for your sounds.
"Your likes, playlists, albums and stations. All in one place."
Are you sure you want to clear your listening history? You won’t be able to undo this action.
Error clearing your listening history. Try again later.
Find all the tracks you’ve listened to here.
Are you sure you want to clear your recently played? You won’t be able to undo this action.
Error clearing your recently played. Try again later.
Find all your recently played content here.
Listen to your likes, playlists & albums offline and ad‑free
"You're in control – choose what information you want to share with apps."
Oops… failed to post comment. Try again later.
Unfortunately the user has disabled comments on this track.
"%1$s won't work unless you enable Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your device."
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. Please try again.
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are not supported by your device."
"%1$s won't run unless you update Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are currently updating."
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.
Paused because you started playing on another device
All current and future offline content will be downloaded to your internal device storage and removed from your SD card.
All current and future offline content will be downloaded to your SD card and removed from your internal device storage.
An account verification e-mail was sent to the address you signed up with. Please click the link in this e-mail to make comments.
Oops… failed to send e-mail. Try again later.
Get it for a limited time
Get offline listening, no adverts or previews, and the largest collection of streaming tracks anywhere on the planet
Unlock all previews and get access to more than 150M tracks from emerging and major label artists

"Either this subscription does not have a trial, you have already used your free trial or are a resident of Quebec and are not eligible for a trial due to local restrictions.
By purchasing a subscription, you will be charged the current regular price per month (including applicable local sales taxes) unless cancelled before your next renewal date."

"Offer is only available for users that have not had a free trial. First %1$s of subscription for total of %2$s. If user does not cancel their subscription before the end of these %1$s, the subscription will auto-renew every month at a price of %3$s/month until user cancels.
Ad‑free is defined by the removal of interruptive audio and visual experiences."

"Offer limited to one %1$d day trial per user. After the first %2$d days, subscription renews automatically unless cancelled before the end of the %3$d day trial. Subscription may be cancelled at any time on soundcloud.com. All prices include applicable local sales taxes.
Residents of Quebec, Canada are not eligible for trials due to local restrictions."
*For students enrolled at a Title-IV degree-granting college or university
Looks like something went wrong. Please try again.
Want to listen offline and advert-free?
Want to stream in higher quality?
Discover more with our SoundCloud Go plans
Discover even more with SoundCloud Go+
Choose a display name and add a photo to personalise your profile

"We may use your email and devices for updates and tips on SoundCloud's products and services, and for activities notifications. You can unsubscribe for free at any time in your notification settings."
Sorry, there was a problem setting your photo
We may use information you provide us in order to show you targeted adverts as described in our Privacy Policy.
Please grant SoundCloud access to read your external storage to access your image.
There was an error cropping your image.

Since you’ve reached your subscription device limit, we’ve signed out this device and de-registered it. Anything you downloaded was removed. You need to sign in before you can re-register this device.
You already have a subscription on three devices. If you register this device, we’ll automatically unregister the one you haven’t used the longest.
You already have downloaded content on 10 devices. You need to sign out of one device before you can sign in on this one.
Are you sure you want to delete this recording?
This will permanently delete this playlist. Are you sure you want to continue?
You will lose all of your edits. Proceed?
New playlists and albums added to your Library won’t download automatically anymore. Existing downloads will still be available offline.
You will no longer be able to access this content offline.
You can now reorder or remove tracks from your playlists
Edit your playlists on the fly
"Turn on all email notifications or select which to receive."

To follow %s, confirm you’re of the required age.
%s has asked us to block your account from following them.

"Your subscription has ended.
You will no longer have offline and advert-free listening, and Go+ tracks are only playable as previews. Don’t worry, you can resubscribe any time."

"You switched from SoundCloud Go+ to SoundCloud Go.
You’ll still have offline and advert-free listening, but Go+ tracks are only playable as previews. Don’t worry, you can switch back any time."
There was a problem enabling your new features and content. Please restart the application.
All previews are now full tracks with SoundCloud Go+
Things are a little different now, in a good way
Now nothing stands between you and the music
Take your music with you. Tap the arrow to download for offline listening
Selecting this will automatically download all your current and future likes, playlists and albums.
You now have access to more tracks than any other streaming service

"Sorry, unable to share to %s. Check your connection and try again."
In order to continue using the SoundCloud app, please update to the latest version.

Limit cannot be set below current storage usage.
Because this device has been offline for more than 30 days, we could not verify your subscription. To regain access to your downloaded content, connect to the Internet with this device.
Your subscription could not be verified
This will download your current and future likes so you can listen without Wi-Fi or a data connection.
Re-insert your SD card or change your storage location to continue managing your downloaded content.
Tap here to view storage settings
We may use your email and devices for updates and tips on SoundCloud’s products and services, and for activities notifications. You can unsubscribe for free at any time in your notification settings.
Tap the arrow to download your liked tracks to your device.
It seems that there is already an active subscription linked to your account.
We were unable to complete the purchase. Please try again.
There seems to be no valid app store on this device.
Too much time has passed to validate your payment. If the problem persists, please contact our support team.
There is already an active subscription
There was a problem trying to connect to the app store. Please try again.
Confirm your email address to purchase a subscription. Check your inbox for confirmation instructions.
We were unable to verify your payment. Please try again later.
Your subscription is associated with a different SoundCloud account. Please make sure your SoundCloud account matches the subscription in your Google Play account.
You are currently on an Apple iTunes Subscription. To be able to change plans, you need to first end your Apple iTunes Subscription in the App Store.
Something went wrong and we are unable to change your plan at this time. Please contact our community support team.
New music based on what’s playing

Check your connection, and tap to try again.
No more previews, just full tracks
Clear the application cache to free up memory on your device
Offline content currently downloads to your internal device storage.
Offline content currently downloads to your SD card.
You get the best possible listening experience with high quality audio, but it will require more storage space on your device.
Turn this on to download all your current and future likes, playlists and albums.
Turn this off to stop automatically downloading new playlists and albums added to your Library.
This will remove all downloaded tracks from being available for offline listening.
This will define how much of your available storage can be used for offline listening.
When this is turned on, we will only download tracks over a Wi-Fi connection.
Waveform comments are visible in the fullscreen player
Changes require an app restart to become effective.
If you turn this setting off, you’ll still receive the same number of adverts but they may be less relevant.
Help improve SoundCloud by sending us regular usage and device data
If you turn this setting off, the communications you’ll see may be less relevant.

Learn more in our Privacy Policy

An endless mix of music including %1$s and more
The Automatic setting selects Standard quality on mobile networks and High quality on Wi-Fi.
Higher quality streaming requires a strong network connection and will use more of your mobile data

All of the music, no adverts
With SoundCloud Go+ you can find mainstream releases, exclusive tracks, remixes, DJ sets and more.

Try SoundCloud Go+ to experience tracks in high quality audio the way they were meant to be heard.
With SoundCloud Go+ your music can go wherever you go. Stream SoundCloud’s entire catalog advert-free and download your favourites for future listening.
Free for %1$d days and then %2$s / month
Tap here to change storage location
Access every track, advert-free, offline, and in high quality.
No more previews. Listen to every second of every track.

Get full access to the world’s largest music and audio streaming catalogue, with ad‑free and offline listening.
